im:artist.label: Chengdu Everimaging Science and Technology Co., Ltd

title.label: Fotor Photo Editor - Chengdu Everimaging Science and Technology Co., Ltd
Disagreement with Customer Service company policy

content.label:
Hi, I recently made the mistake of upgrading to Fotor Pro thinking that the all the Pro features would become available on the desktop version, which is NOT the case. The Pro features are just available online. When I approached the support team to ask if there will be a dekstop version in which you could activate the pro features the answer was that there won't be.

I am not comfortable with uploading my photos online due to privacy concerns and even when it was my mistake (although in my opinion the website is not very clear about Pro just being available online), I requested if they could please refund my money. I had paid the 1-year plan the day before and have no intention to use the service (plus at least for me under MacOS 10.12.2 Safari and Firefox does not work either- recommended by CS Team to switch to Chrome!?!), however the Fotor team just referred me to the impossibility of making a refund due to their Cancellation Policy.

They are of course entitled to do so, and I can only regret having upgrading to the Pro version, but my point is that in my opinion the business ethics of a company willing to take $30 at any cost knowing that the customer made an honest mistake is reprehensible. Due to that I will not recommend this App to any of my friends and will switch to Pixlr or even Photoshop.

As an example of the exact opposite situation I bought some Treblab wireless earbuds some time ago and after repeatedly trying to go running with them I could not manage to get them in place without falling off my ears… after contacting Treblab CS team they refunded my money after returning the earbuds… of course I will look at them again when they release the new model!!
I guess there are ‘COMPANIES' and ‘companies' out there!
Regards.

It has amazing features and some beautiful filters but as soon as i go to save an image i have edited it freezes and will not save as i have to force quit the application. If that issue wasnt there i would be rating it a 5 star.

title.label: Not sure of the point of this update.

content.label: It’s a good app but by changning all the filters the ones we have come to rely on are gone which basically means I have no use for the app anymore. I guess they want us to use the online version now but I think you’ll find I never will.

Used it for a year now and it does some stuff well, but it crashes when you try to do other things. All in all it’s good for a free program, and very easy to use, but I think I’ll have to pay some money for something reliable.

What an awsome little piece of work!!!
I love it!

I have been using iPhoto, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Bridge, etc. This amazing app. has blown me away totally. I rate this very highly in terms of capability, features, ease of use, functions, capabilities, variety, diversity of options & overall user friendly operation. As a first time user, I know I am going to use this software much more. Cannot thank you enough for such an awesome software.
This is a really, really cool app if you want to ediit photos!!! I think it’s AWESOME!!

This app was a great app for creating one of my friends birthday cards! You could easily add your own photos to the collage and then you had the choice whether to put them onto an already made template or create your own.

With the photo editing part of the app, you could change the whole way you see the image by adding many different colours and tones.

Overall, an easy to use product and if you love photography or graphic design, then you will love this! :)
